ðŸ“– Summary: The Snake_Apple repository provides articles and tools for macOS security research. It includes source code examples, custom programs, and Python scripts (including CrimsonUroboros) used in the research. The repository serves as a companion to a series of articles documenting the author's findings on macOS security vulnerabilities and reverse engineering techniques.
